original_title: おそ松くん スイカの星からこんにちわザンス！
overview: Episode-length Osomatsu-kun film, released as a feature of the Toei Manga Movie Festival. Loosely based on a manga chapter, the film revolves around an alien plot to take over the world.
title: Osomatsu-kun: Greetings From The Watermelon Planet-zansu!
